alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CATTARAUGUS AND SOUTHERN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Long Point State Park, or 13 miles west of Jamestown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Lakewood, Falconer, Long Point State Park, Jamestown West, Frewsburg, Busti, Gerry, Ellington, Celoron, Sherman, Panama, Bemus Point, Stedman Corners, Niobe, Stow, Kennedy, Ellery Center, and Ashville. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 6 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
